location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, George Green, to Henry Moore, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter reports the news that George Skipp has returned from Shyrass [Shiraz] and now sails to Basra with George Green and a large amount of Bushire stock aboard the Revengeand Tyger. Also reports that the Eagle, and the Fancy, and the Dolphinhave begun their patrol between Carrack [Kharg] and Bushire. Also discusses the punishment to be given a tardy naquida [nakhoda] and an application for house rent from Ensign Ferris [?].
